@description.name: @description
@description
@description.body: Create a loader for the given scripts.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scriptArr {Array|String} the uri name(s) of the script(s) to load
@param.description: the uri name(s) of the script(s) to load

@description.name: @description
@description.body: fired when a script is loaded successfully. The data contains 'script' and 'status' keys.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: fired when a specific script fails loading.  The data contains 'script' and 'status' keys.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: fired when all given scripts are loaded, each time loadScriptsDynamic is called.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Map of scripts being added at the present time. Key is script name; value is instance of this class which
is loading it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Map of scripts that have fully loaded. Key is script name; value is true

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Array of the scripts to be loaded

@description.name: @description
@description.body: True if start has been called.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Start loading scripts. This may only be called once!

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Promise?} a promise which will be resolved after load of all scripts if promise support is enabled; nothing (undefined) if promises are not enabled.
@return.description: a promise which will be resolved after load of all scripts if promise support is enabled; nothing (undefined) if promises are not enabled.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Chain loading scripts.

Recursively called until the array of scripts is consumed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
